body.name: AODK Gaming Computer Desk, 40 Inch Small Desk with Power Outlets, Study Table with Drawer and Keyboard Tray, Reversible Desk with Adjustable Monitor Shelf and Storage Shelf for Home Office, Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Easy to Assemble & Considerate Service】It is easy to assemble this computer desk. All needed assembly tools and instruction are coming with the desk. Please first feel free to contact us once you find any product problems about assembly or damaged issue. We can figure out everything for you.

【Power Outlets for Charging】This office desk owns a built-in power strip with 3 AC Outlets & 1 USB Port & 1 Type-C Port which can provide power support for all your electric equipment such as laptop, ipad and phone.

【Adjustable Monitor Shelf】The monitor stand shelf can be adjusted to 3 height positions (3.9''/5.1''/6.3'') to meet your needs. It is a ergonomical design for people to have a comfort work position such as looking directly into the screens rather than down, avoiding neck pain.

【Pull-out Keyboard Tray & Fabric Drawer】This desk is equipped with a keyboard tray and one drawer. The pull-out keyboard tray suits for full size 108 Keys keyboard or 87 Keys keyboard adding mouse. A baffle on it can prevent the keyboard from slipping out. The drawer made of fabric is ready to use and easy to clean. It offers a private space for storaging your goods.

【Reversible Desk with Shelf】This 40''W x 19.7'D' x (33.7''-36.1'')H compact desk can be a study table for a small space room such as bedroom. The shelf below the desktop can be assembled at left or right for your convenience. It can also be a PC stand when the middle board is removed. A headphone hook is equipped on the other side of the desk.

【Premium Material】The tabletop of this modern desk is made of solid particleboard with high quality. It is designed with scratch-resistant, anti-collision and waterproof. The thick metal frame with high quality ensures the desk stable and sturdy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AODK Computer Desk with Keyboard Tray and Drawer This computer desk owns a built-in power strip which can provide power support for all your electronic equipment. The monitor stand shelf can be adjusted to 3 height positions (3.9''/5.1''/6.3'') to meet your needs.It is equipped a keyboard tray and one drawer. A baffle on it can prevent the keyboard from slipping out. The drawer made of fabric is ready to use and easy to clean.The side shelf can be assembled at left or right and there is a headphone hook on the other side of the desk.
Previous page Next page 1 Power Outlets 2 Adjustable Monitor Stand 3 Pull-out Keyboard Tray 4 Fabric Drawer 5 Adjustable Storage Space

Is it easy to assemble the keyboard tray part？ Yes, it is very easy and it slides smoothly. Does it need a screwdriver, hammer, or drill to assemble? No, it doesn't. We have all assembly tools in the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid desk, great price, perfect for any age
reviews.reviewText: We are so happy with this desk for our 11 year old grandson! It took some time to put together but nothing too difficult, great instructions. It’s the perfect size, made well and will last for years to come. We also love all the extras, the hook for headphones, the cutout for the power strip/usb plug. Thank you for a great product! He will love his Christmas gift this year!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thrilled with this purchase!
reviews.reviewText: If you've ever bought anything that needed to be put together, you KNOW what a nightmare it can be. I was very pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to put this desk together. The directions are precise and easy to understand. All the items that were supposed to be included, were. Everything was clearly marked as to which part it was and where is was supposed to go. When putting the desk together, the holes were where they were supposed to be - imagine that! The drawer is made of a heavy duty nylon - I have desk supply tray in that drawer that works perfectly. The outlets and port on the upper shelf are really handy - it's nice they're off to the side of the upper shelf. For the ease of construction and quality of materials, this desk is truly worth every penny. I'm extremely happy with my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice and Sturdy Compact Desk
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 40 inch desk as I had a very small spot to put it. It fits very nicely. The desk was really pretty easy to assemble, I only made 1 mistake at the beginning by not lining the holes up on the main legs. Other than that all the holes lined up nicely and I was able to put it together all by myself. I love the build in plug ins, it saves a lot of cords running behind it.It has plenty of room for my big monitor and my laptop opened as a separate monitor. I don't really use the higher stand for my monitors (I'm getting old and like my monitors closer to me).Really my only complaint is the keyboard tray. On the 40 inch model a full size keyboard with number pad and a mouse is a tight fit. If I ever need to order another keyboard, I'll probably skip the number pad and then it will have plenty of room. A full size keyboard fits but it's tight with a mouse. Also, the keyboard tray slides so smoothly, that it tends to slide in as I'm typing on it. I've just added a clothes pin to the side to help with this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for!!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a better desk for my home office. Since I work from home, it had to be something large enough to give me the space I need but not so large that it takes up the room. This was the perfect solution!!!Pros:Size is amazing, adjustable monitor ledge, keyboard drawer, drawer and shelves. I worried about the sturdiness of a fabric drawer, but it's been great so far.Cons:The keyboard tray needs to be a little higher. I sit high in my chair so it's a little low for me. If you sit low, it's not an issue.Construction can be tricky. Make sure to pay really close attention to the directions if you care which side the shelves are on. I put it together and had to take it apart because I looked at the instructions incorrectly. Otherwise, construction was not bad.Overall, I would buy this desk again and recommend to anyone who asked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good desk, good price
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice desk. Not too hard to assemble. Seems sturdy and works nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this to fit in a small space to start a fully remote job. I can see how it would be hard to assemble solo in the beginning just holding the parts while trying to screw things in but directions were simple to follow and it even had an extra screw of each type which came in handy cause one screw it the batch had no threads. We actually put the top shelf on facing away rather than over the desk to give more space on top and because it fit to extend over a ledge to be flush with the wall. The draw works well even though the sides of it are fabric and the whole desk is sturdy. Supports 2 monitors on the shelf and i love access to the plugs on top for my phone. Overall really happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well engineered, and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I'm old, and I've assembled a lot of furniture, but I've never had a complex item that went together as smoothly as this. It helped that all of the parts were machined properly and there were no misalignments. More important, though, the manufacturer clearly labeled every item rather than just showing a picture and leaving it for the customer to figure out. Instead of the usual sheet with some sketches, this desk came with a manual that showed every step in detail, and which parts (by number) would be required. The process went so well that I actually enjoyed it. The finished product seems more sturdy than most assemble-it-yourself projects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The directions were a little confusing and the assembly video wasn’t that helpful. Took 3 hours to build by myself. I love this desk though, so spacious and quality materials!
